pageContent: © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Presented by:  Rachel Wholl and Ralph Stewart  Jenzabar  June 2, 2016  Hello, Can You Hear Me? © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Emails  •   New functionality – content blocks and dynamic content  •   Campaigns     Letters  •   Manual process vs quick merge links  •   Dashboards to track quick merge links  Overview © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Create your email templates...now with conditional text! © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  1. Create Content Blocks  •   Defines information that is included in an email once the criteria is met.  •   Can include more specific information about students within an email.  2. Configure Dynamic Content  •   Defines variations (*case sensitive*) that will use the content blocks to assign merge fields.  •   The content box is where you will pick the data (content blocks) that defines the field values.  Content Blocks © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  3. Add Content Block to Email Template  •   Merge dynamic content into an email template.  4. Create Report with Objects in Content Blocks  •   Query on report in an email campaign when using a template with dynamic content.  Conditional Text © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Schedule Campaigns and Never Look Back  Broadcast:  •   Individual email blasts.  •   1 campaign sent daily  for one week = 7 broadcasts.  Campaign:  •   Collection of broadcasts.  •   Who should get the  emails?  No more worrying about remembering which emails to send when! © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Tutorial © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  7 Steps vs 1 Step – Which would you choose?  Conga Mail Merge Wizard   Quick Merge Links © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Follow 5 steps so you can go from manually processing thousands of letters to pressing one button:  1.   Create checkbox field for letter.  2.   Create and upload template (letter, labels, envelopes).  3.   Create report.  4.   Set up quick merge link.  5.   Launch!  Quick Merge Links © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Create a dashboard to see which quick merge links need to be launched.  1. Use the report ID from the quick merge link to create a new report.  2. Add grouping to the new report and save.  To Launch or Not to Launch? © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  3. Create a dashboard with a different component for every quick merge link . © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  4. Add quick merge link URL into dashboard. © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  5. Schedule refresh. © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Tutorial © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     myjenzabar.net     jrmhelp.jenzabar.com  JRM Community
